home.title: PRESTIGE Hlatswa Koloi
home.subtitle: Ditshebeletso tsa Tlhokomelo ya Koloi tse Phahameng

hero.title: Ditshebeletso tsa Boitsebiso tsa ho Hlatswa Koloi
hero.subtitle: Fumana se seholo ka ho fetisisa tlhokomellong ya koloi ka ditshebeletso tsa rona tse phahameng tsa ho hlatswa le ho hloekisa

quality.title: Boleng bo Phahameng
quality.description: Thepa ya boitsebiso le dihlahiswa tse nang le botsoalle ba tikoloho

convenience.title: Ho Buuka ho Bonolo
convenience.description: Ho buuka ha inthanete ho bonolo ka dinako tse feto-fetohang

tracking.title: Ho Latela ka Nako ya Nnete
tracking.description: Latela tsoelo-pele ya tshebeletso ya hao ka nako ya nnete

luxury.title: Ditshebeletso tsa ho Hlatswa Koloi tse Botle
luxury.description: Ho hlatswa ha boitsebiso le diphetho tse kganyang

interior.title: Ho Hloekisa ka Hare ho Phahameng
interior.description: Tlhokomelo e khethehileng ya dintho tsa ka hare tse botle

lounge.title: Sebaka sa Bareki se Hlahisang
lounge.description: Sebetsa ha re ntse re hlokomela koloi ya hao

transformation.title: Phetoho e Makatsang
transformation.description: Diphetho tsa pele le ka mora tse buang ka tsona

express.name: Thunder Wash & Vacuum
express.description: Ho hloekisa ho potlakang bakeng sa maphelo a maphuthing! Sehlopha sa rona sa boitsebiso se fana ka tlhokomelo e tloaelehileng ya koloi ya hao.
features: Ho hlatswa ka matla a phahameng
Ho hlatswa ho se nang matheba

premium.name: Classic Wash & Wax Express
premium.description: Tlhokomelo ya koloi e phahameng le tshireletso ya wax express. E loketse haholo bakuli ba tloaelehileng ba batlang khanya e tswellang nako e telele.

deluxe.name: Supreme Wash & Polish
deluxe.description: Ho hlatswa ho felletseng le tshebeletso ya wax polish e phahameng bakeng sa tshireletso e phahameng le khanya.
features: Wax polish e kganyang e phahameng
Ho hloekisa mafensetere ka hare le kantle

executive.name: Ultimate Detail Experience
executive.description: Boiphihlelo bo felletseng ba ho hloekisa koloi ka clay bar treatment le machine buffing e phahameng.
features: Ho qeta wax HD e phahameng
Ho hloekisa ka hare ho tebileng
